3.10.3.0:

添加项目：
添加了退出按钮在界面添加了色彩聊天和设置“欢迎”“公告”的指令R/G/B参数

改进: 
改进了路障,物品箱子,结构网格改进了专用服务器的异常改进了专用服务器的性能改进了按下按钮时切颜色改进了切换（swap）改进了物品颜色代表质量改进了背包表面比例改进了在客户端上车辆更加顺畅
调整: 

调整了"Effect Quality" 到 "Debris Quality"的视觉感觉

修复: 
修复了在游戏中改变分辨率的问题修复了丧尸重生时，出错的问题修复了物品不在原地偏位的问题修复了聊天的问题修复了在游戏改变范围解析的问题修复了丧尸在主界面转载的问题(不明觉厉)修复了附件无效果的问题修复了衣服无效果的问题修复了肘部的重量修复了预览版的成就错误修复了专用服务器的默认质量修复了切换衣服的问题修复了带眼睛无头发的问题修复了加载额外结构的问题修复了重载界面的颜色问题修复了车辆不会损坏的问题修复了合成后物品卡住的问题修复了附件保存后损坏的问题修复了衣服的UI问题修复了人物保存的问题修复了一些名称错误修复了ID需要连续的错误修复了服务器没有服务器列表的问题修复了确定设置后关闭设置设置会复位的问题(很容易理解的)修复了专用服务器无法加载视觉皮肤


我周三毕业啦~

感谢阅读

replies.author: Yihc
replies.txt_content:
原文：

Hello! 

If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode "OPERATIONMAPLELEAF". 

Priorities:

You may have noticed several updates that were switched on and then back off the last week or so, as the current major goal is to improve networking performance. I still have several things to test, but hopefully it will get much better in the future. 

To help with this I've also added Linux support which should lower hosting costs and open up access to higher quality servers. There are still some issues to work out though, so the client is not yet in tip-top shape. When testing it on your server run it with ulimit -n 2048 as it currently opens too many files as part of mod support. 

Other than that I want to try and fix up the game as much as possible before moving onto new content and features such as hunting/fishing/the next map. 

Steam Inventory:

Valve's new inventory service is now out of beta and implemented in Unturned. This will allow you to customize your character with silly cosmetics that it wouldn't make much sense to find in-game such as 3D glasses. 

It also means you will be able to make money on the community market selling cosmetic item drops you get, and opens up the option to add Steam trading cards to Unturned which I see commonly requested. Going forward this can also be expanded to include community contributions from the curated Workshop. 

For the mean time, however, I believe it is best to leave this disabled until the above priorities are complete. What do you think about the sound of it though? 



Trello:

The to-do list page found here is now a lot more organized! If you want to see what is currently being worked on you can check back there. 

3.10.3.0 Patch:

Additions: 
Added ability to escape out of alerts on the menu.
Added colored chat support and R/G/B parameters to say/welcome commands. This is open to rocket mod developers as well.

Improvements: 
Improved barricade/structure networking with many items in crates.
Improved dedicated server to show exceptions.
Improved dedicated server performance.
Improved tooltip to match the color if its button.
Improved tooltip to swap sides based on space on screen.
Improved inventory backgrounds to show item quality.
Improved cosmetic inventory scaling.
Improved vehicle speed smoothing on client.
Improved resource ID linking.

Tweaks: 
Tweaked "Effect Quality" to "Debris Quality" to make more sense.

Fixes: 
Fixed changing resolution in-game.
Fixed bug when zombies respawned.
Fixed item positioning over network.
Fixed an exploit using rich text in chat.
Fixed changing scope resoltion in-game.
Fixed zombies loading on main menu.
Fixed invalid casts with attachments.
Fixed invalid casts with clothing.
Fixed elbow bending weight.
Fixed preview achievement.
Fixed dedicated server default quality.
Fixed cosmetic cloth swapping collider.
Fixed glasses not register for hair/beard.
Fixed loading structures extra packet.
Fixed message like reload getting colored.
Fixed vehicles not to damage structures.
Fixed slot items stuck after crafting them.
Fixed attachments save getting corrupted.
Fixed closing clothing UI icons file.
Fixed order of character saving.
Fixed some classes in the wrong namespace.
Fixed resource IDs needing to be continuous.
Fixed no servers box on server list.
Fixed confirmation buttons to reset after closing.
Fixed dedicated server failing to load visual clothes.

On a personal note this Wednesday is graduation! :D 

Thanks for reading!
